titles.title: A bill to require plans for military installations for full military funeral honors for veterans at such installations.
Creig Sharp Funeral Honors for Veterans Act
Creig Sharp Funeral Honors for Veterans Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Creig Sharp Funeral Honors for Veterans Act
This bill requires the commander of each military installation, at or through which a funeral honors detail for a veteran is provided, to maintain and implement a plan for the requested provision of full military funeral honors at funerals of qualifying veterans.
